Package control

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BookManagementController
    BookManagementController is the controller that manage all books, domains, subject and authors.
    BookManagementController.PropertyAuthor
    inner class that contains propery strings of author attributes
    BookManagementController.PropertyBook
    inner class that contains propery strings of book attributes
    BookManagementController.PropertyDomain
    inner class that contains propery strings of domain attributes
    BookManagementController.PropertySubject
    inner class that contains propery strings of subjects attributes
    BookPageController
    BookPageController.
    BookPopularityReportController  
    BookReportController  
    BookReviewsController
    BookReviewsController is the controller that responsible to show all the reviews of a specific book.
    ClientConnectionController
    ClientConnectionController create instance to client, and presave into ClientController with static variable for communication later with the GUI and clients.
    ClientController
    ClientController called by the GUI, create this instance and then manage "menu" of events because this controlled registered as handler of all triggers.
    DatabaseController
    This class include the methods for SQL queries. the class also include the connection into the constructor.
    EditReviewController
    EditReviewController is the controller that responsible to show a review and allows to approve or decline it.
    EditUserLibrarianController
    EditUserLibrarianController.
    ExternalPaymentController
    ExternalPaymentController Responsible to make payments.
    FileChooserSample
    This class responsible for choosing an image for a book.
    HomepageLibrarianController
    HomepageLibrarianController is the controller after user logged in.
    HomepageManagerController  
    HomepageUserController
    HomepageUserController is the controller after user logged in. this the main menu of the user, here he manages the actions in system.
    LogoutController
    LogoutController is the controller that responsible to log out the user.
    MessagesController
    This class handles the messages that recived from the system to the user.
    MessagesController.Messages
    Inner class for messages that will be added as a row.
    MyBooksController
    Makes a popularity report given a specific user The class will make a book list of the books that the user purchased including for each book- id ,title ,language ,date of purchase and the price at the acquisition date
    PaymentController
    PaymentController is the controller that responsible for get answer from the external payment company and make the purchase in DB.
    PendingAccountTypeController
    PendingAccountTypeController is the controller that responsible to show the requested AccountType list.
    PendingAccountTypeController.pendingAccount
    Inner class for filling the table dynamically.
    PendingRegistrationController
    PendingRegistrationController is the controller that shows a list of all the registration requests.
    PendingRegistrationController.pendingUser
    inner class that contains propery strings of pending user attributes
    PendingReviewsController
    PendingReviewsController is the controller that responsible to show the pending reviews and opening a specific review.
    PendingReviewsController.pendingReview
    Inner class that responsible for filling the table.
    RegisterController
    This class manage the actions when the guest forward to registration.
    ScreenController
    ScreenController exchange screens. the class presave "pointer" to stage.
    SearchBookController
    SearchBookController.
    SearchBookResultsController
    SearchBookResultsController.

    SearchUserController.
    SearchWorkerResultsController
    SearchWorkerResultsController.
    SearchWorkerResultsController.SearchWorkerResult
    stores the search worker result details.
    ServerController  
    SetAccountTypeController
    SetAccountTypeController is the controller that responsible to send the Account Type request of the user to the DB.
    UserPageController  
    UserReportController
    Makes a popularity report given a specific user The class will make a book list of the books that the user purchased including for each book- id ,title ,language ,date of purchase and the price at the acquisition date
    WriteReviewController
    WriteReviewController is the controller that responsible about writing a review for a book.
